channel.title: [HELP] [PI] How do i make a teleport item?
channel.description:
To start off with, Im running a PI source. Basically what i want is, i want to make a item, and when you click it it teleports me somewhere, Like a teleport tab but not make the item dissappear after i use it once.
I know firstclicknpc Exists, and firstclickobject but in my files it doesnt have any item like that or i would use that as a template but i dont even know if firstclickitem even exists. If you would like to help me by posting a code, that would be greatly appreciated.
And can you please specify what file i need to put that into.
The item code is 3062 And when i click it it should teleport me to 2713 9459
